title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Kostyantynivka of Donetsk region.
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Kostyantynivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Krasnohorivka, Kostyantynivka and Urozhayne of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
